New as you might be, \n you remember our \n rules.

 weight, you lose your

I was hoping to get the \n day off, but Lisa got on \n my case.
You'd better listen to \n her. Remember, a lazy \n worker-
Is a hungry worker, I \n know!
Oh, heya drift rat, \n you gettin' along \n with Lisa?

 to fill you two up 
 doesn't come free,

 our way.

 pit.

Hey! Believe me, 
 I didn't want to 
 come drifting 
 here either.

Excuse me...

 want? Come to tell

I heard that whole spiel \n about being able to \n control gravity.
Cecie might fall for \n your stories, but I \n won't.

I'm not lying. If you \n don't wanna believe me, \n that's your problem.
I just came here to \n convey a message from \n Lisa.
She wanted you to check \n the fleet's \n gravitational energy.
There, message conveyed.

Tell her to leave it to

Oh, uh no, I think I \n can handle it...

I see...

Fine.
Here's your provision. \n Rest up for tomorrow.
Right! \n Thank you!

It's complicated.

 dropped her here.

No, but she'll be \n back. Just leave \n her be.
You're not worried?
Worrying doesn't solve \n anything, and I don't \n have time for coddling.
Our job is to work hard \n and repay our debts. \n That's our way of life.
Wow, harsh...
There's the mining boat.
